Requirement.formula: #program; var object = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('MuseumOfSuperFineArts')); if(isNULL(object)) { object = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('TowerOfSpringfield')); } if(isNULL(object)) { object = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('MonteBurnsResortCasino')); } if(isNULL(object)) { return false; } return Building::isBuildingInArrangeBonus('Gondola', object)
